<div class="pagination green">
    <a href="#"> « </a>
    <a href="#"> 1 </a>
    <a class="active" href="#"> 2 </a>
    <a href="#"> 3 </a>
    <a href="#"> » </a>
</div>

    <a href="#"> » </a>
</div>

Combinations

Mix and match .rounded, .inverted, and .bordered to create the perfect pagination
Rounded, Bordered, Default Pagination

« 1 2 3 »

Inverted, Bordered, Red Pagination

« 1 2 3 »

Inverted, Rounded, Bordered, Green Pagination

« 1 2 3 » 
<!-- Rounded, Bordered, Default Pagination -->
<div class="pagination rounded bordered">
    <a href="#">«</a>
    <a href="#">1</a>
    <a class="active" href="#">2</a>
    <a href="#">3</a>
    <a href="#">»</a>
</div>


<!-- Inverted, Bordered, Red Pagination -->
<div class="pagination inverted bordered red">
    <a href="#">«</a>
    <a href="#">1</a>
    <a class="active" href="#">2</a>
    <a href="#">3</a>
    <a href="#">»</a>
</div>

<!-- Inverted, Rounded, Bordered, Green Pagination -->

<div class="pagination inverted bordered rounded green">
    <a href="#">«</a>
    <a href="#">1</a>
    <a class="active" href="#">2</a>
    <a href="#">3</a>
    <a href="#">»</a>
</div>

Spacing

The .more-spacing class spreads out the pagination

Default

« 1 2 3 »

More Spacing

« 1 2 3 » 
<div class="pagination more-spacing">
    <a href="#"> « </a>
    <a href="#"> 1 </a>
    <a class="active" href="#"> 2 </a>
    <a href="#"> 3 </a>
    <a href="#"> » </a>
</div>

Alignment

Alignment classes help justify your pagination

Left

« 1 2 3 »

Center

« 1 2 3 »

Right

« 1 2 3 » 
<-- Left Align -->
<div class="text-left">
    <div class="pagination">
        <a href="#"> « </a>
        <a href="#"> 1 </a>
        <a class="active" href="#"> 2 </a>
        <a href="#"> 3 </a>
        <a href="#"> » </a>
    </div>
</div>

<-- Center Align -->
<div class="text-center">
    <div class="pagination">
        ..
    </div>
</div>

<-- Right Align -->
<div class="text-right">
    <div class="pagination">
        ..
    </div>
</div>
